name.ch: 光學系統設計與產品研發

notice.ch: 碩博同修。不在分發優先順序內或名額外學生請拿密碼卡。

remark.ch: 碩博同修。不在分發優先順序內或名額外學生請拿密碼卡。

goal.ch: 介紹光學元件與系統的基本原理和設計概念與技術，以及產品研發之規劃、專利分析、設計與驗證流程，並配合實例演練，以建立學生在光學設計的學理與應用、光學軟體的使用及應用光學系統之產品研發的概念與能力。
goal.en: Introduces the basic principles and design concepts and techniques of optical components and systems, as well as the planning, patent analysis, design and verification process of product development, with practical examples to build students‘ academic knowledge and experience in optical design. Application, use of optical software and concepts and capabilities in product development of applied optical systems.The course offers concepts and techniques of optical system design and optical product development

outline.ch:
第1章 光學應用系統簡介
第2章 創意與發明的概念
第3章 光學設計概念探討
第4章 專利分析與佈局簡介
第5章 創意開發技巧探討
第6章 產品研發流程與架構
第7章 產品研發實例探討
outline.en:
Chapter 1 Introduction to Optical Application Systems
Chapter 2 Concepts of Creativity and Invention
Chapter 3 Discussion on Optical Design Concepts
Chapter 4 Introduction to Patent Analysis and Layout
Chapter 5 Discussion on Creative Development Techniques
Chapter 6 Process and Structure of Product R＆D
Chapter 7 Discussion on Examples of Product Development
